text: Nabiyow Yallaa kee ellecaboh ayró nummayse maray yallaa kee kay farmoyta cine mara yakcine mageyta, ken abbobti yakken way, hinnay ken xaylo yakken way, hinnay ken tooboko yakken way, hinnay ken kedó yakken way, Yalli woo marih sorkocobbaxittet iimaan arciseeh, isi xaquk isi catot ken maqarroyseh, kaadu jannootay guba weeqaytitte kak gexxa ken culsa usun teetil waarak, Yalli ken meqe taamoomi keenik raabiteeh, keenih abe mattaccoo kaak raabiteenih (jannatal), woo mari Yallih cizbi, oobbiya! Digga luk Yallih cizbi, usun yisillime mara
